TopicTitle: Career mode: Fly to minmus, 140 log messages.

Articles.Content:
So again I'm proven correct in that they never loveing ONCE played a career mode game just to check they didn't break the excrements out of everything. Fire the idiot in charge of QA.

Basically if you have taken several missions, and now start doing one of them, you get a log message for EVERY SINGLE PARAMETER you fulfill for ANY ONE OF THE MISSIONS YOU'VE TAKEN. And you have to right-click through each and every one.
 

Edited April 4, 2018 by Lightzy

Sorry, man. Its a known issue and they're working on it:

 

Edited April 4, 2018 by Pthigrivi
Yup, I've been using an autoclicker to get through the backlog of mail I got from doing tourist missions.
